scripts.build: browserify src/grafar.js -o build/grafar.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --sourceMaps true ]
scripts.watch: watchify src/grafar.js -o build/grafar.js -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --sourceMaps true ]
scripts.build-nightly: browserify src-nightly/grafar.js -o build/grafar.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --sourceMaps true ]
scripts.watch-nightly: watchify src-nightly/grafar.js -o build/grafar.js -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --sourceMaps true ]
scripts.v3: npm run c-v3 && browserify compiled/demo--canvas.js -o compiled/bundle.js
